Title: The Secret of My Success
Writer: Jim Cash (screenplay), Jack Epps Jr. (screenplay), AJ Carothers (screenplay), AJ Carothers (story)
Actors: Michael J. Fox, Helen Slater, Richard Jordan, Margaret Whitton
Plot: A talented young man can't get an executive position without rising through the ranks, so he comes up with a shortcut, which also benefits his love life.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 1 win.
